word_mean: 诵读困难：虽能看字、识字，但却不能诵读和书写，为一家族性常染色体显性遗传病，男性较多
阅读障碍一种较常见的表现为阅读、书写等能力缺陷的神经综合征，分为获得性阅读障碍和发展性阅读障碍。

sentence.Network_en: Until comparatively recently, dyslexia remained largely unrecognised.
sentence.Network_cn: 诵读困难症一直没有引起太多的注意，这种情形直到最近才有所改观。

sentence.Network_en: Overcame childhood dyslexia to graduate second in his high - school class.
sentence.Network_cn: 克服幼儿时期所患的诵读困难症后以第二名的优异成绩毕业于一所中学.

sentence.Network_en: One of the effects of dyslexia, in my case at least, is that you pay tremendous attention to detail.
sentence.Network_cn: 诵读困难的一个影响就是过分注意细节，至少对我来说是如此。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 阅读障碍（DYSLEXIA）及其他特殊学习困难 （Specific Learn ing Disabilities ）：　在香港，特殊学习困难仍然是个「隐形」的问题…
失读症（dyslexia），又称诵读障碍或阅读障碍，是一种疾病，也是一种常见的学习障碍。有失读症的人，智力同一般人并无差别，但 …
(一)诵读困难(dyslexia) 诵读困难与特殊诵读不能(specific reading disabi1ity)、发育性诵读障碍(developmental reading disorder).
读写障碍 (dyslexia)，也称为读写困难，是一种最常见的特殊学习困难。根据国际读写障碍协会 (International Dyslexia Association, 20…

list.abs: phonological construction 音位结构phonological dyslexia 拼音性失读症phonological system 音位系统
surface contact 表面接触surface dyslexia 表层失语症surface reflectance 表面反射
...acquired distinctiveness of cues 线索的习得明显性acquired dyslexia 获得性阅读不能
developmental disorder 发展失常developmental dyslexia 发育性诵读困难developmental genetics 发生遗传学

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: coined in German from dys- 'difficult' + Greek lexis 'speech' (apparently by confusion of Greek legein 'to speak' and Latin legere 'to read')

entry.def: If someone suffers from dyslexia, they have difficulty with reading because of a slight disorder of their brain.

means.word_mean: 1. impaired ability to learn to read

auth_sentence.content: Sir Richard Branson overcame dyslexia to become a millionaire.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sir Richard Branson overcame dyslexia to become a millionaire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sir Richard Branson overcame dyslexia to become a millionaire.

auth_sentence.content: Maybe it's a sort of scholarly dyslexia.
auth_sentence.res_content: Maybe it's a sort of scholarly dyslexia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maybe it's a sort of scholarly dyslexia.

auth_sentence.content: Dyslexia-specific brain activation profile becomes normal following successful remedial training.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dyslexia-specific brain activation profile becomes normal following successful remedial training.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dyslexia-specific brain activation profile becomes normal following successful remedial training.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"病"; 2. 表名词,"总称,状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: a无+nem血+ia病→n.贫血,贫血症
dys坏,不良+lex词+ia病→读词不行
dys坏+peps消化;胃+ia病→消化不好
hypo在……下面+chondr忧郁+ia病→在下面忧郁→忧郁症
in不+somn睡眠+ia病→n.失眠症
pyro火+man狂+ia病→n.纵火狂
ambros不死的+ia总称,状态等→n.神仙食品,美味
corn角+u+cop丰富+ia表示物→表示丰富的角→丰饶角
in内部+sign信号+ia总称,状态等→内部标志

stems_affixes.value_cn: 知识分子[集合称],知识阶层,知识界
stems_affixes.word_buile: intelligent聪明的,伶俐的+s+ia总称,状态等→n.知识分子[集合称],知识阶层,知识界
milit兵+ia总称,状态等→n.民兵[组织]
minute细小的+ia总称,状态等→n.微枝末节,细节

stems_affixes.value_cn: 乌托邦,理想的完美境界,空想的社会改良计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: utop没有的地方即no place+ia总称,状态等→乌托邦现实中是没有的
dys坏,不良+function功能→n.[医] 机能不良
dys坏,不良+lex词+ia病→读词不行
dys坏,不良+opsy视力→n.弱视
dys坏,不良+peps消化;胃+ia病→消化不好

stems_affixes.value_cn: [医] 发声困难, 言语障碍
stems_affixes.word_buile: dys坏,不良+phon声音+ia病→n.[医] 发声困难, 言语障碍
dys坏,不良+phor带来+ia病→带来不好状态→焦虑
dys坏,不良+trophy营养→n.营养不良
dys坏,不良+lex词+ia病→读词不行
